#summary How to build Google URL library with Linux

= Introduction =

How to build Google URL library with Linux

= Details =

  # Checkout the latest source from SVN
{{{
svn checkout http://google-url.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ googleurl
}}}
  # Create a SContruct file int the googleurl/src folder
{{{
env = Environment(CPPPATH=["..", "../../"])

source = [str(file) for file in Glob('*.cc')]

for file in Glob('*test*.cc'):
  source.remove(str(file))

env.SharedLibrary('google-url', source)
env.StaticLibrary('google-url', source)
}}}
  # Modify googleurl/base/logging.h and  for compatibility
{{{
// logging.h:10
#ifdef WIN32
#include <tchar.h>
#else
#define TCHAR char
#endif

// basictypes.h:9
typedef unsigned long long uint64;
}}}
  # Install [http://www.scons.org/ SCons] and run the scons command in the src folder
